name: SUMO (itch) (Handley Shelton)
description:
THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS! IF THE GAME DOES NOT WORK IN BROWSER TRY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION!

SUPER DESCRIPTIVE DESCRIPTION-----------------------------------------------------------

This is a 3D sumo "Simulation" game, The game can be played against an AI or locally.

---- handleyshelton.com

https://www.patreon.com/Indieo

CONTROLS  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Player 1 

Move------ WASD

Push------- SHIFT

Player 2 

Move----- Arrow Keys

Push------ SHIFT
